Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Hopefully <clr:0000>President Yunobo <clr:ffff>comes back
from <clr:0000>storage <clr:ffff>soon. I really need to ask
him about hiring more staff.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Really? <sp:5:0:0>That's too bad.<sp:0:4:0>All the young Gorons are so obsessed
with <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>that they stopped
working, so we're badly short-staffed.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Oh, hello! All the Gorons are back to
work, so I actually don't need your
help anymore!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Now we just have to find something that'll
be as popular as marbled rock roast.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>As long as you're wearing that armor,
you can go <clr:0000>into the caves<clr:ffff> without
worrying about the heat.
You'll still die if you fall in lava though,
so...<sp:5:0:0>don't do that.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>President Yunobo's policy says you don't
have to be an employee to <clr:0000>sell me things<clr:ffff>.
Don't be shy, now!
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, not for nothing—don't be fooled by
the cooler temperatures aboveground.<sp:0:4:0>There's still lava <clr:0000>inside the caves<clr:ffff>. You'll
get <clr:0000>burnt to a crisp<clr:ffff> if you go there
dressed like that.
Unless you're dying to know how a
baked apple feels, I'd recommend
investing in some <clr:0000>fire-resistant gear<clr:ffff>.
The flamebreaker armor I sell would more
than do the trick.
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>Oh, wow.<sp:5:0:0> That... That I can't buy.<sp:5:0:0> Sorry to
disappoint you.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I'm sorry,<sp:5:0:0> but if you want to sell those
clothes, you have to take them off first.
Talk_10:
<sp:c9:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Ah, good! <sp:5:0:0>You have no idea how badly
you were needed. We have a dire staffing
shortage at the moment.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>All the young Gorons are so obsessed
with <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>that they can't
be bothered to swing a pickax.
I hope <clr:0000>President Yunobo <clr:ffff>will address the
issue somehow, but in the meantime, we
need all the workers we can get.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Oh, hello! The Gorons are back to work,
so I actually don't need your help!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>...In less-good news, we can't mine
marbled rock roast anymore. That was
our most popular edible rock.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, not for nothing—don't be fooled by
the cooler temperatures aboveground.<sp:0:4:0>There's still lava <clr:0000>inside the caves<clr:ffff>. You'll
get <clr:0000>burnt to a crisp<clr:ffff> if you go there
dressed like that.
Unless you're dying to know how a
baked apple feels, I'd recommend
investing in some <clr:0000>fire-resistant gear<clr:ffff>.
The flamebreaker armor I sell would more
than do the trick.<sp:0:4:0>And if you don't have enough rupees,
don't worry. You can make some quick
cash by <clr:0000>selling me things you don't need<clr:ffff>.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Hopefully <clr:0000>President Yunobo <clr:ffff>comes back
from the <clr:0000>city<clr:ffff> soon. I really need to ask
him about hiring more staff.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><clr:0000><snd:Happy>President Yunobo<clr:ffff> is the entrepreneurial
genius who founded <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>He started it as a small mining business to
boost Goron City's development. But then
out of nowhere, he struck it rich!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>has since become the world's
leading name in mineral mining, with both
Gorons and Hylians on its payroll.
And it all began with one hard-working
Goron. Talk about inspirational!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'll admit <clr:0000>President Yunobo <clr:ffff>has been
acting a little...<sp:5:0:0>off since <clr:0000>marbled rock
roast <clr:ffff>first appeared on the scene.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But you can't argue with all he's
accomplished.<sp:5:0:0> The guy made Goron City
what it is today.
Com_Talk_05b: <sp:3:0:2:0101>Please choose what you want to sell.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm sorry for assuming that you were a
worker before.<sp:0:4:0>I guess I was hoping you were. With
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>on the scene,
<clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>has been badly understaffed.
ShopBefore:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>You know, some folks say they don't
need <clr:0000>fire-resistant gear<clr:ffff>. How very wrong
they are!<sp:0:4:0>Sure, with Death Mountain erupting less,
temperatures aboveground are cooler
than they once were.<sp:0:4:0>But <clr:0000>inside the caves<clr:ffff>? Forget it. You'll get
roasted without adequate protection!
ShopAfter:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>You want some <clr:0000>fire-resistant gear<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0> Smart.
Temperatures have cooled aboveground,
but it's still hot <clr:0000>in the caves<clr:ffff>.
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Of course.<sp:5:0:0> What are you looking to sell?
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm in no rush. Take your time deciding.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're looking for <clr:0000>President Yunobo<clr:ffff>,
he's at <clr:0000>YunoboCo Storage <clr:ffff>in front of HQ.

I think he's trying to get more marbled
rock roast.

Oh, or were you here to sell
me something?
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> Did you come here in hopes of
getting a job in the mines?<sp:0:4:0><snd:Happy>I hate to let you down, but we actually
have enough hands.<sp:0:4:0>Since the marbled rock roast disappeared,
the young Gorons have come back to
work in a big way.
We have so many kids lining up to swing
pickaxes that we're no longer accepting
new applicants.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's kinda too bad, because that marbled
rock roast was YunoboCo's most popular
edible rock...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But what are you going to do? Trends
come and go!<sp:0:4:0>And with President Yunobo acting like his
old self again, I'm sure he'll sniff out the
next big thing when it comes along.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>President Yunobo opened this office for
the benefit of everyone, whether or not
they're YunoboCo employees.
Please come again!
Com_Talk_02b:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Thanks!<sp:5:0:0> Is there anything else you'd like
to part with?
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I think <clr:0000>President Yunobo<clr:ffff> is at <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>Storage <clr:ffff>in front of HQ, making a deal for
more marbled rock roast.
Com_Talk_02c:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Notice_00>Pleasure doing business with you!<sp:5:0:0>
Anything else you want to sell me?
Com_Talk_05: <sp:3:0:2:0101>Whatever it is, I'll buy it! I don't care!
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>I knew it!<sp:5:0:0> I saw you walking around with
President Yunobo, and I just knew!

The workforce has dried up ever since the
younger Gorons got into <clr:0000>marbled rock
roast<clr:ffff>, so it's nice to see some new blood!
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Notice_00>Thank you!<sp:5:0:0> And I can buy more stuff,
if you're looking to sell.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>I don't believe we've met before.<sp:0:4:0>Are you a new worker here? Please tell
me you are.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Not only do we deal in fire-resistant
equipment but we'll also buy from you.<sp:0:4:0>Come by whenever you need to.
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>That's fine. Just know you're going to get
the same price wherever you go.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I see.<sp:5:0:0> Well, I'm sure President Yunobo
must be with you for some other reason.<sp:0:4:0>The young Gorons are all so into <clr:0000>marbled
rock roast<clr:ffff> that they've stopped working.
We need all the hands we can get.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><sp:0:2:2:5000>We wouldn't be quite so short-staffed if Offrak and
Slergo were here. Where have they gone off to?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But worker or not, President Yunobo has
a policy that allows anyone to shop here.<sp:0:4:0>If you need fire-resistant gear or want to
sell something, come by. Even if nobody
else is working, I will be.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>Aha! You're not the only one who's
interested in <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It's the most popular edible rock the
company sells. All the young Gorons are
going nuts for it!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The problem is, marbled rock roast can
only be found in really, and I mean
REALLY, tough bedrock.
<clr:0000>President Yunobo<clr:ffff> is the only one who
can mine through such tough stone, so
our supply of the stuff is pretty scarce.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_01>Your inventory's full. <sp:5:0:0>I can buy some of
that stuff off you, if you'd like.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Glad to see President Yunobo has finally
taken off that tacky mask.<sp:0:4:0>I'm not sure why, but he seems gentler
without it. More like himself.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Notice_00>Of course! <sp:5:0:0>I'll be glad to gush some more
about <clr:0000>President Yunobo<clr:ffff>!
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hmm. Did you stop by in search of a job?<sp:0:4:0>Sorry to send you home from Goron City
with a "no," but we've nearly got more
hands than we've got hammers.
The young Gorons are working harder
than ever now that all the marbled rock
roast is gone.
We're fully staffed and then some. We've
had to stop taking applications!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Marbled rock roast was YunoboCo's
signature snacking rock, so I'm curious
what this might mean for the company...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, well. Trends change. We'll just have
to be at the forefront of the next one!<sp:0:4:0>And with President Yunobo acting like
himself again, I know we'll be ready to
meet it.
Talk_05:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm... Didn't I tell Offrak and Slergo to go and guard
<clr:0000>YunoboCo Storage<clr:ffff>? I wonder how they're doing...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Uh... <sp:5:0:0>Did you not hear me explain it
the first time?
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>I see you're interested in the
<clr:0000>flamebreaker armor<clr:ffff>. Does that mean
you're a new worker here?
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I think <clr:0000>President Yunobo<clr:ffff> is in the city
inspecting the <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Trends come and go. I wonder what
edible rock will be the next big craze...
